title: Appear Offline on Instagram: 2 Easy Ways to Hide Your Status

steps.title: Tap the profile icon or your profile photo.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon or your profile photo. You'll see either a small version of your profile photo or an outline of a person at the bottom-right corner of Instagram .

steps.title: Tap the three-line menu ☰.
steps.content: Tap the three-line menu ☰ . It's the three horizontal lines at the top-right corner. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is the gear icon on the menu. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This option has a lock icon and is near the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Activity Status.
steps.content: Tap Activity Status . It's near the bottom of the "Interactions" section.

steps.title: Tap the "Show Activity Status" switch to turn it off .
steps.content: Tap the "Show Activity Status" switch to turn it off . If the switch is in the On position, anyone can see when you're active on Instagram. Toggling off this switch disables your activity status and makes it look as if you're offline, even when you're not. [4] X Research source Turning off your activity status doesn't disable read receipts . This means that even though you now appear offline, people you've chatted with via direct messages can still see when you've seen their messages or are actively typing a response. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Instagram.com.
steps.content: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Instagram.com. If you're using Instagram on a computer , it's easy to disable your activity status to appear offline.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . You'll see this on the menu. This expands the Edit Profile window, as well as other settings you can manage. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Privacy and security tab.
steps.content: Click the Privacy and security tab. You'll see this in the left panel.

steps.title: Remove the checkmark from "Activity Status."
steps.content: Remove the checkmark from "Activity Status." As long as the checkbox is blank, nobody will know when you're actively using Instagram, nor will they know when you were last active. [7] X Research source Even though you now appear offline, any friends you're chatting with in your direct messages can still see when you're actively typing a response. They'll also be able to tell when you've seen their message. [8] X Research source
